column4: after updating my system, I no longer have sound. Out put from lspci | grep -i audio is00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801G (ICH7 Family) High Definition Audio Controller (rev 01)
can someone point me in the right direction? I am a fairlynew user to ubuntu
did you mute your volume controls?
not that I am aware of. My mute button is not lit, so there should be sound
